Loading needed packages
```{r, message = FALSE}
library(R.matlab)
```


Reading the data
```{r}
# Set the file path
data <- "data/data.mat"

# Read the .mat file
data <- readMat(data)

# Explore the structure of the loaded data
str(data)
```
